alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 9:52PM EST until February 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and J.T. Myers Dam. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Kentucky... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. .Snow, sleet, and ice melt from last week`s winter storm will cause points along the Ohio River to rise and remain above minor flood stage into this weekend. For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 35.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday afternoon to a crest of 37.3 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
